a ready-to-use FileStoreUtils object.
Throws:
intradoc.common.ServiceException - if a FileStoreProvider cannot be found.

retrieveSigProfilesFilePath

public java.lang.String retrieveSigProfilesFilePath()
                                             throws intradoc.common.ServiceException
Query for the particular Sign Request Protocol (SRP) to send, currently we are using a one-to-one architecture where each SRP only contains a single Signature Profile, so locating the correct profile is as simple as finding its SRP.

Returns:
Path to Profile in vault directory
Throws:
intradoc.common.ServiceException - - if more or less than 1 Profile is located or issues locating Profile in vault

intradoc.common.ServiceException - - error retrieving UserData from service

getProfileWithMatchingTagAndUserRoles

public intradoc.data.ResultSet getProfileWithMatchingTagAndUserRoles(java.lang.String profileTag)
                                                              throws intradoc.common.ServiceException
Utility method for acquiring Signature Profiles stored within Content Server, filtered against the passed in profileTag and the acting user's Content Server role collection.

Parameters:
profileTag - - Content's profile tag to filter profiles against
Returns:
ResultSet containing all Profiles matching names tag and users roles
Throws:
intradoc.common.ServiceException - - if more or less than 1 Profile is located

rollback

public void rollback(java.lang.String error,
                     boolean isRedirect)
              throws intradoc.common.ServiceException
Rolls back all activity and transactions associated with our dDocName that have occurred from the start of the CoSign process. The check-out is undone, signature status is cleared out, CoSignCheckedOutItems cached resultset is cleared of related row, and error is thrown

Parameters:
error - - Error message that is being passed from CoSign server
isRedirect - - boolean flag to handle Content Server trays layout issues
Throws:
intradoc.common.ServiceException - - errors during undo checkout

addItemToCoSignCacheTable

public void addItemToCoSignCacheTable(java.lang.String contentId)
                               throws intradoc.common.ServiceException
Adds new row with dDocName tp CoSignCheckedOutItems caches resultset. If row exists with data that matches the dDocName it will be removed prior to insertion. These rows will be used elsewhere to manage Content Server flaws with the trays layout, as well as clean-up of expired CoSign sessons.

Parameters:
contentId - - Value to locate then remove in resultset
Throws:
intradoc.common.ServiceException - - error searching, removing, or adding row from resultset

removeItemFromCoSignCacheTable

public void removeItemFromCoSignCacheTable(java.lang.String contentId)
                                    throws intradoc.common.ServiceException
Updates the CoSignCheckedOutItems cached resultset, by removing the row that matches the passed in dDocName

Parameters:
contentId - - Value to locate then remove in resultset
Throws:
intradoc.common.ServiceException - - error searching and removing row from resultset

                                         java.lang.String contentId)
                                  throws intradoc.common.ServiceException

Parameters:

contentId - - Value to locate then remove in resultset
Throws:
intradoc.common.ServiceException - - error searching and removing row from resultset

filterName - - Name of column in resultset value is stored under
Throws:
intradoc.common.ServiceException - - error searching and removing row from resultset

                                     throws intradoc.common.ServiceException
